payment.title: Payment Demo
payment.disclaimer: This is a demo for illustration purposes only. No real transactions will be processed.

methods.walletNotice: You will be redirected to complete payment in the wallet app.
methods.wechatQrNotice: Scan the QR code with WeChat to complete payment.
methods.bankTransferNotice: You will be redirected to your bank to authorize the payment.
methods.redirectNotice: You will be redirected to complete payment on the provider's website.
methods.voucherNotice: A payment voucher will be generated. Please complete payment at the designated location.
methods.qrCodeNotice: Scan the QR code with your payment app to complete the transaction.

errors.invalidCardNumber: Please enter a valid card number
errors.invalidExpiryDate: Please enter a valid expiry date
errors.nameTooShort: Name must be at least 2 characters
